summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4167 for the improvement of 15th Avenue Northeast, from East Pacific Street to East Northlake Avenue; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49736, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
